name: Princess Story Maker
description:
Bring your favorite princesses to life! Style them and enjoy the storybooks of classic fairy tales!

In Princess Story Maker, you own the most beautiful magic closet in the land! Princesses from all over have come to ask for help! Can you help Snow White, Beauty, Cinderella, and Snow Queen all look their best?

Meet the princesses you create in interactive storybooks, and read along to classic fairy tales!

FEATURES
- Mix and match dresses and accessories
- Lots of bright and beautiful makeup colors
- Create your own storybook princesses
- Fully voiced in English
- Save your outfits and share them with family and friends
- Tablet-compatible
